channel.title: [FM] Popcorn Mafia - Turbo Version Canned - Like It Never Existed, Rip
channel.description:
## [color=lightgreen] Welcome :popcorn: [/color]
Welcome to this game! ~~I was totally not forced to host this by FK~~
## [color=lightgreen] Rules [/color]
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
## [color=lightgreen] Popcorn Mafia - Gameplay [/color]
* Right before the game begins, after alignments are rolled, the Mafia must choose one town player to be the Gunholder.
* Everyone is always aware of who is currently holding the gun.
* The person who holds the gun can at any time shoot another player.
* If the player they shoot is mafia, that mafia goon will die.
* If the player they shoot at is town, the shooter will die and the town they shot at will become the new Gunholder.
* The town wins when all mafia are dead. The mafia win when the number of mafia is greater than or equal to the remaining town.
* The game is nightless and there are no lynches. After receiving the gun, you have 10 minutes to shoot another player or you will die and a random town player will get the gun.
* The Gunholder shoots by typing **/Shoot [Player Name]** in thread.
* Mafia will have a day chat where they can use all the time.
More can be found here (this is a turbo version though):
https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Popcorn_Mafia
### [color=lightgreen] Rolelist [/color] 8x [color=green]Citizens[/color] 3x [color=red]Mafia[/color]
### [color=lightgreen] How To Join: [/color]
Simply /in or /join or anything! Idc.
### [color=lightgreen] Playerlist [/color] 1. 2. DatBird 3. 4. 5. 6. 7. 8. 9. 10. 11.
### [color=lightgreen] Back-ups [/color]
1. 2. 3. 4.
### [color=lightgreen] Spectators [/color]
1. KyoDaz 2. 3. 4.
